mapper.sql: select id, workorder_name, workorder_number, company_id, line_id, product_name, product_code, product_number, production_start, production_end, start_time, end_time, product_standard_hour, create_time, create_by, update_time, device_liable, update_by, people_number, working_hour, overtime_hour,overtime_race, manual_time, workorder_status, operation_status, init_date, work_sign, scrap_num, actual_warehouse_num,cumulative_number,direct_pass_rate,paramConfig,bad_number,product_model,remark,order_code,ecn_status,ecn_text,sign, put_into_number,sign_time,sign_huor,abolish,wl_sign,make_type,work_price,pb_sign,jpush_tag from dev_work_order
mapper.select: where id = #{id}
SELECT workorder_number as workorderNumber FROM dev_work_order where id = #{workId} and company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.insert:
insert into dev_work_order
workorder_name, workorder_number, company_id, line_id, product_name, product_code, product_number, production_start, production_end, start_time, end_time, product_standard_hour, create_by, update_time, device_liable, update_by, people_number, working_hour, overtime_hour, overtime_race, manual_time, workorder_status, operation_status, init_date, work_sign, scrap_num, actual_warehouse_num, bad_number, product_model, cumulative_number, direct_pass_rate, paramConfig, remark, order_code, ecn_status, ecn_text, wl_sign, make_type, work_price, pb_sign, jpush_tag, create_time
#{workorderName}, #{workorderNumber}, #{companyId}, #{lineId}, #{productName}, #{productCode}, #{productNumber}, #{productionStart}, #{productionEnd}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{productStandardHour}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{deviceLiable}, #{updateBy}, #{peopleNumber}, #{workingHour}, #{overtimeHour}, #{overtimeRace}, #{manualTime}, #{workorderStatus}, #{operationStatus}, #{initDate}, #{workSign}, #{scrapNum}, #{actualWarehouseNum}, #{badNumber}, #{productModel}, #{cumulativeNumber}, #{directPassRate}, #{paramConfig}, #{remark}, #{orderCode}, #{ecnStatus}, #{ecnText}, #{wlSign}, #{makeType}, #{workPrice}, #{pbSign}, #{jpushTag}, now()
mapper.delete:
delete from dev_work_order where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select id as id from dev_work_order where workorder_number = #{workorderNumber} and company_id = #{companyId} limit 1
SELECT id as id FROM dev_work_order where line_id = #{lineId} and wl_sign =#{sign} and workorder_status = 1 limit 1
SELECT id as Id,workorder_number as workorderNumber FROM dev_work_order where workorder_status = 1 and company_id = #{companyId};
SELECT * FROM dev_work_order where company_id = #{compand_id} and line_id = #{line_id} and wl_sign = #{wlSign} and workorder_status = 1 limit 1;
SELECT * FROM dev_work_order where company_id = #{compand_id} and line_id = #{line_id} and workorder_status = 1 and operation_status = 1 limit 1;
where company_id= #{companyId} and production_start BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59');
where company_id= #{companyId} and date(production_end) = date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day);
SELECT id,company_id as companyId,line_id as lineId,wl_sign as wlSign FROM dev_work_order where wl_sign = #{wlSign} and workorder_status in (1,2)
mapper.update: update dev_work_order set ecn_status = 1 where company_id = #{companyId} and product_code=#{productCode} and workorder_status =0;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dev_work_order where company_id = #{companyId} and line_id = #{lineId} and workorder_status in (0,1) order by workorder_status desc;
SELECT * FROM dev_work_order where company_id = #{compand_id} and line_id = #{line_id} and wl_sign = #{wlSign} and workorder_status = 2 order by end_time desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update dev_work_order set sign = 0 where id = #{workid} ;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dev_work_order where line_id =#{lineId} and workorder_status != 2 limit 1;
mapper.update: update dev_work_order set abolish = 1 where id = #{workId}
mapper.select: SELECT id as id,workorder_number as workorderNumber FROM dev_work_order where company_id = #{companyId} and wl_sign = #{wlSign} order by create_time desc
SELECT id as id,workorder_number as workorderNumber,work_price as workPrice FROM dev_work_order where company_id = #{companyId} and workorder_status = #{workOrderStatus}

select a.id as id,a.workorder_number as workorderNumber from dev_work_order as a left join tab_single_work_order as b on a.id = b.work_id and b.single_id = #{singleId} where a.company_id = #{companyId} and a.line_id = #{lineId} and a.workorder_status = #{workorderStatus} and a.wl_sign = #{wlSign} and b.work_id is null

SELECT w.* FROM dev_work_order as w,tab_single_work_order as wo where w.id = wo.work_id and w.line_id = #{lineId} and w.wl_sign = #{wlSign} and w.company_id = #{companyId} and wo.single_id = #{singleId} and w.workorder_status = #{workStatus} limit 1
select line_name from dev_production_line where id = #{lineId}
select workorder_number,line_id,product_code,product_name,product_number,start_time,end_time,make_type from dev_work_order where workorder_number = #{workCode}
